item.description:
Hey everyone! Per your requests - I will tentatively set this meetup for this coming Saturday.

Unlike the last one, this one is more freestyle, where we can choose to play any sports people would like to. I can bring a frisbee and a football, but if people want to bring other stuff like a soccer ball or badminton equipment, that would be great. I will update this meetup later this week, depending on the signup and the weather forecast.
item.name: Sports Meetup - Frisbee, football, bocca?
